Behold, <S%H1129><s%> I am about to build a house <S%H1004><s%> for the name <S%H8034><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> to dedicate <S%H6942><s%> it to him, <S%H6999><s%> and to burn before <S%H6440><s%> him incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices, <S%H8548><s%> and for the continual show bread, <S%H4635><s%> and for the burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> morning <S%H1242><s%> and evening, <S%H6153><s%> on the Sabbaths, <S%H7676><s%> and on the new moons, <S%H2320><s%> and on the set feasts <S%H4150><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> our God. <S%H430><s%> This is an ordinance forever <S%H5769><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then Huram <S%H2361><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Tyre <S%H6865><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> in writing, <S%H3791><s%> which he sent <S%H7971><s%> to Solomon, <S%H8010><s%> "Because Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> loves <S%H160><s%> his people, <S%H5971><s%> he has made <S%H5414><s%> you king over them. <S%H4428><s%>"

Now I have sent <S%H7971><s%> a skillful <S%H2450><s%> man, <S%H376><s%> endowed <S%H3045><s%> with understanding, <S%H998><s%> of Huram <S%H2361><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>'s,
